mapper.select: SELECT X.*,Y.* FROM( SELECT T1.b1, T1.b2, T1.c1, T1.c2, T1.b3, T1.rnum AS no FROM( SELECT hr.userId as b1, hr.betSeq as b2, hr.betReturn as b3, TO_CHAR(count(betResult)) as c1, TO_CHAR(sum (betResult)) as c2, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY betSeq desc ) AS rnum FROM bet_history hr group by betSeq,userId,betReturn )T1 WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size}) AND T1.c1 = T1.c2 )X NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM bet_history where betReturn = 0 )Y where b3 = 0
